title: PolitiFact - Barack Obama says he 'kept a campaign promise to toughen ethics rules'
subtitle: In a 30-second ad released Jan. 18, 2012, President Barack Obama’s reelection campaign touts his record on several issue
author: www.politifact.com
vclaim: In an ad, President Barack Obama's re-election campaign quoted PolitiFact to back up a claim that he had passed ethics reforms. We check to see whether the attribution is accurate.
